DataElement.preferredName: Notification Administration Performed Study Activity Status Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed action within the context of a given study that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. A coded value specifying the phase in the lifecycle of a performed activity. EXAMPLE(S): For a lab test, this would be the condition or stage in the lifecycle of the test (e.g., "completed", "canceled", etc.).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.
